alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cassia and southwestern Minidoka Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Hansen, or 17 miles northwest of Oakley Reservoir, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Cassia and southwestern Minidoka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and a Flash Flood Warning is in effect. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
